resources.string: Please check your Internet Connectivity and then try again.
No Internet Connection! Please check your connection and try again.
No New Updates Available. We\'ll notify you when new updates arrive.
No Events Here! We\'ll notify you when events are added.
No Videos Here! We\'ll notify you when videos are added.

The app has been developed by the third year students of University Institute of Technology RGPV, Tarun Solanki and Shubhi Shukla pursuing their bachelor\'s degree in engineering in Computer Science and Electronics and Communication respectively.
Copyright © The rights regarding the app are reserved with TechPursuiters.
The app has used the following resources for some of the contents:

The purpose of this app is to bring the societies of UIT onto a single platform. The app focuses on providing regular updates of the events and various activities carried out by the different societies.

The app has not been made in collaboration with any of the societies and does not support any particular club as specific. The app provides unaltered information of the societies as given on their respective Facebook pages. The app does not alter any information of the societies provided by them, be it their logos or any event, update, photo or video they upload. The logos are used specifically for the ease of access of the users and the app does not use them in any illicit manner.
The app is solely an independent work of the developers.

Missed an important update of the college clubs? Here\'s to the rescue - an app that brings all the societies of UIT RGPV onto a single platform and keeps you updated with the various events and activities carried out by the societies by providing regular notifications. Download the app here:
